item.title: Golang Kathmandu Meetup #5 - Sep
item.description: September 13 2020 RSVP Here https://www.meetup.com/Golang-Kathmandu [Talk] No-instrumentation Log Injection in Go with eBPF. Ishan Mukherjee Co-founder: Pixie Developer Problem: Go programs are designed to be performant but we often don’t have the right code-level instrumentation when a performance issue arises in a production go program. It’s hard to predict where issues will arise and we can’t instrument everything as over-aggressive instrumentation leads to maintenance overheads. Motivating Developer Experience:
